sections.title: Servo Types in FTC
sections.content: FTC uses two main types of servos: standard (noncontinuous) and continuous rotation. Each serves different purposes.

sections.title: Servo Types
sections.subtitle: Key differences
items: Standard servos: Move to a set position (0-180 degrees)
Continuous rotation: Spin endlessly like a motor

sections.title: Controlling Each Type
sections.code:
// Standard servo
claw.setPosition(1.0); // Fully open
claw.setPosition(0.0); // Fully closed

// Continuous rotation servo
spinner.setPosition(0.5); // Stop
spinner.setPosition(1.0); // Full speed forward
spinner.setPosition(0.0); // Full speed reverse

sections.title: Choosing the Right Servo
sections.content: Choose the right servo type for your mechanism: standard for arms and claws, continuous for spinners and wheels.
